name: Spitting Sucy
description:
Who doesn't love the Sucy who wishes to spit on everything in the world?

A 5 level whack-a-mole style game that requires you to hit a specific amount of targets before the timer runs out. 

  • Extract the zip File 
  • Run SucyGame.exe
  • Have fun!

Developed as a quick anti stress fanart game featuring characters from the anime "My Little Witch Academia".

  • Characters by Trigger
  • Music by TAM Music Factory
